title: Prompt Draft Contract
description: Frontend-authored contract snapshot for prompt drafts. Backend must store the markdown/yaml payload per this shape.

id.description: Unique identifier generated for each prompt draft.

name.description: Friendly name shown in the UI when selecting a prompt.

markdown.description: MarkdownV2 content body used at runtime.

createdAt.description: ISO8601 timestamp when the draft was authored on the frontend.
